title: Welcome to Chaudhary Matasya Farm
description: Established in 1992, we're a leading name in Nepal's aquaculture sector. With expertise honed through decades of experience, we pride ourselves on delivering top-quality fish products to our customers. Our farm, nestled in Sunsari District, boasts over 15 meticulously crafted ponds, where we breed a diverse range of fish species including Rahu, Naini, Grass Crap, Common Crap, Silver Crap, Bhakur, Bighead and Tilapia(kotri). At Chaudhary Matasya Farm, excellence is not just a goal; it's our commitment to you.
